name: Meteor Crush VR
description: Protect our planet from incoming meteoroids! Use your VR controllers to crush every one coming your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 300 MB available space
